publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6579 Cathie Craigie: Cumbernauld College, Champion Investors in People—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld College on being recognised as an Investors in People (IIP)Gold Standard organisation; notes that this IIP award givesrecognition tothe college as an institution operating at the highest levels of people management practices; further praises the college on being the first organisation in North Lanarkshire to achieve this prestigious award; notes that less than 1% of the 35,000 IIP-recognised organisations across the United Kingdom hold this award, and congratulates the management, staff and students on their accomplishment.

S3M-6579 Cumbernauld College, Champion Investors in People (lodged on 15 June 2010) Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Kidd*, David Whitton*, George Foulkes*, Bill Butler*, Jamie Hepburn*, James Kelly*, Jackie Baillie*, Elaine Smith*, Mary Mulligan*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-6579 Cumbernauld College, Champion Investors in People (lodged on 15 June 2010) Jack McConnell*, Karen Whitefield*, Trish Godman*

S3M-6579 Cathie Craigie: Cumbernauld College, Champion Investors in People—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld College on being recognised as an Investors in People (IIP)Gold Standard organisation; notes that this IIP award givesrecognition tothe college as an institution operating at the highest levels of people management practices; further praises the college on being the first organisation in North Lanarkshire to achieve this prestigious award; notes that less than 1% of the 35,000 IIP-recognised organisations across the United Kingdom hold this award, and congratulates the management, staff and students on their accomplishment. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell, Bill Kidd, David Whitton, George Foulkes, Bill Butler, Jamie Hepburn, James Kelly, Jackie Baillie, Elaine Smith, Mary Mulligan, Hugh Henry, Jack McConnell, Karen Whitefield, Trish Godman, Michael Matheson*, Linda Fabiani*
